addToHome.title: Install Our App (Ordering Made Easy!)
addToHome.description: Add the app to your home screen for quick ordering
addToHome.importantNote: Please make sure to use Safari browser. Other browsers like Chrome may not support this feature.
addToHome.step1: In Safari browser, tap the share button at the bottom of the screen (square icon with upward arrow)
addToHome.step2: Scroll down in the share menu, find and tap "Add to Home Screen" option
addToHome.step3: Tap the "Add" button in the top right corner to confirm
addToHome.desktopStep1: Tap the Install icon on the right side of the address bar
addToHome.androidStep1: Tap the browser menu (three dots icon)
addToHome.androidStep2: Select 'Install app' or 'Add to home screen'
